/>
V.iii.3.3.b
.
Complications of Rheumatic Fever
Complications of rheumatic fever include
cardiac arrhythmias
pericarditis
rheumatic pneumonitis
pulmonary embolism
pulmonary infarction
valve deformity, and
in extreme cases, congestive heart failure.
title: M21-1, Part V, Subpart iii, Chapter 3 - Infectious Diseases, Immune Disorders, and Nutritional Deficiencies
citation: Part V, Subpart iii, Chapter 3, Section None
